sentences.sContent: I’m not joking. Those were his actual words.
sentences.sCn: 我没开玩笑，那都是他的原话。

sentences.sContent: I know Germany won, but I can’t tell you the actual score.
sentences.sCn: 我知道德国队胜了，但我不知道确切的比分。

sentences.sContent: Interest is only charged on the actual amount borrowed.
sentences.sCn: 利息只按实际借款额收取。

sentences.sContent: In actual fact (=  really  ) , there is little evidence to support the allegations.
sentences.sCn: 事实上，这些指控几乎没有证据支持。

sentences.sContent: ...Dutt says they were not able to evaluate the actual scientific qualifications of the applicants using the data in the files...
...and then doing the actual test in class the ticking clock overhead...
...but the actual reduction in postgraduate numbers is of real concern as international-students make up the majority of numbers in many postgraduate courses and research teams in science...
...it calls for people’s awareness of the serious pollution around us and actual action to reduce the waste...

synos.tran: 真实的，实际的；现行的，目前的

words.tran: 成为现实；发挥出潜力（等于actualize）
实行；使成现实；发挥出…的潜力

trans.tranOther: used to emphasize that something is real or exact
